headlines.description: — Jalen Hurts forced a throw into double coverage, one of his worst passes in years, and was picked off. A.J. Brown — he of the nearly 1,500 yards receiving a year ago — threw a tantrum on the sidelines when the ball didn't come his way.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jalen Hurts runs for 2 TDs, throws for a score; Eagles hold off fumble-prone Vikings 34-28

events.name: Green Bay Packers at Atlanta Falcons

headlines.description: — When Arthur Smith sent the word to his offense — we're going for it on fourth down — the Atlanta Falcons were fired up.
headlines.shortLinkText: Robinson shines, Koo kicks winning field goal as Falcons rally past Packers 25-24

events.name: Las Vegas Raiders at Buffalo Bills

headlines.description: — The worse Josh Allen feels one week, the better he plays the next.
headlines.shortLinkText: Allen and the Bills bounce back from a season-opening dud with 38-10 rout of the Las Vegas Raiders

headlines.description: — Lamar Jackson did more than enough to beat the Bengals, even without injured running back J.K. Dobbins.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lamar Jackson, Ravens hold on to beat Cincinnati 27-24. Bengals 0-2 for second straight year

headlines.description: — Geno Smith, Tyler Lockett and the Seattle Seahawks showed their
headlines.shortLinkText: Geno Smith's 2nd TD pass to Tyler Lockett lifts the Seahawks to a 37-31 OT win over the Lions

events.name: Los Angeles Chargers at Tennessee Titans

headlines.description: — The Tennessee Titans finally got a much-needed sigh of relief.
headlines.shortLinkText: Folk's OT field goal in rain helps Titans snap 8-game skid with 27-24 win over Chargers

events.name: Chicago Bears at Tampa Bay Buccaneers

headlines.description: — Baker Mayfield is determined to make the most of an opportunity to jump-start his NFL career with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mayfield shines again, Buccaneers stay unbeaten with 27-17 victory over struggling Bears

events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Jacksonville Jaguars

headlines.description: — Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs insist they're fine despite another lackluster offensive effort.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chiefs overcome mistakes to beat Jaguars 17-9, Kansas City's 3rd win vs. Jacksonville in 10 months

headlines.description: — Indianapolis quarterback Anthony Richardson played a bit more than one quarter Sunday against the Houston Texans before departing because of a concussion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Richardson scores twice before leaving with concussion as Colts beat Texans 31-20

events.name: San Francisco 49ers at Los Angeles Rams

headlines.description: — More than a few San Francisco 49ers acknowledged they didn't know a whole lot about many of the unsung players going against them for the rebuilding Los Angeles Rams.
headlines.shortLinkText: 49ers force 2 late turnovers and hold on for a 30-23 rivalry victory over the LA Rams

events.name: New York Giants at Arizona Cardinals

headlines.description: — On the first play of the second half, New York quarterback Daniel Jones dropped back and heaved a 58-yard completion to rookie Jalin Hyatt over the middle of the field.
headlines.shortLinkText: Daniel Jones throws for 321 yards, Giants rally from 21-point deficit to beat Cardinals 31-28

events.name: New York Jets at Dallas Cowboys

headlines.description: — CeeDee Lamb went into the home opener for the Cowboys without new sidekick Brandin Cooks, who injured a knee in his Dallas debut a week earlier.
headlines.shortLinkText: Prescott has 2 TDs, Wilson 3 picks in 1st start after Rodgers injury as Cowboys beat Jets 30-10

headlines.description: — Washington cornerback Benjamin St-Juste didn't flinch after Brandon Johnson snared Russell Wilson's 50-yard Hail Mary touchdown pass off a double deflection with no time...
headlines.shortLinkText: Howell leads big rally for Commanders, who hold on to beat Broncos after Wilson's Hail Mary

events.name: Miami Dolphins at New England Patriots

headlines.description: — Tua Tagovailoa has heard a lot during his NFL career about his shortcomings. Beating the New England Patriots isn't one of them.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mostert runs for 2 TDs, Tagovailoa throws for another as Dolphins hold off Patriots 24-17

events.name: New Orleans Saints at Carolina Panthers

headlines.description: — Tony Jones Jr. is making the most of his elevation from the Saints' practice squad, while Chris Olave continues to make plays for unbeaten New Orleans.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tony Jones Jr. scores twice, Saints' defense shuts down Panthers' Bryce Young in 20-17 win

headlines.description: — T.J. Watt and Alex Highsmith knew what was coming. Maybe the Cleveland Browns should have, too. It's the same thing that always seems to be coming when they visit Pittsburgh in the regular season.
headlines.shortLinkText: T.J. Watt's scoop-and-score lifts Steelers past Browns 26-22 as Cleveland loses Nick Chubb to injury
